titles.title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to design, and acquire a site for, a Federal building to be constructed in Steubenville, Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

bill.summary: 6/30/1993--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of General Services to design and acquire a site for a Federal building to be constructed in Steubenville, Ohio. Authorizes appropriations.
